pageProps.content:
USING NEXT-OPTIMUS-README

This project is used to demonstrate how to use next-optimus-readme which generate project documents by transpiling a couple of markdown files.

This will be presented as home page!

Enjoy! ðŸ˜€

HOWTOs

% cd your/work-directory
% git clone https://github.com/lwz7512/next-optimus-readme.git
% git clone https://github.com/lwz7512/using-optimus-readme.git

Then install -> generate docs -> preview by:

% cd using-optimus-readme
% npm i
% npm run docs
% npm start

visit http://localhost:5000

done! ðŸ™Œ

Note: Change your logo/banner/menu in package.json, and put image files into assets folder. You could push this newly generated docs to github then deploy it as github pages.

Requiements

  • Node environment version > 12
  • Basic knowledge of frontend tech

TODOs

  • favicon images customization
  • add more themes like github pages provided
  • Architect theme conversion to next.js
